Title: Spaghetti Western and Meatballs
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Kit Boss, Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (staff writer), Kelvin Yu (staff writer), Scott Jacobson (staff writer), Holly Schlesinger (staff writer), Wendy Molyneux (staff writer), Nora Smith (staff writer), Steven Davis (staff writer)

Plot: Bob and Gene bond over spaghetti western movies, which makes Louise jealous.
